item.title: Puslapenzas
item.description: Follow Quick Start guide to setup hugo and create a new site. Note: Use -f to select yml format hugo new site -f yml Make sure you install latest version of hugo(>=0.83.0). After you have created a new site, at Step 3 follow the steps:
